started a new hobby project. high surface tension + good energy (and actually entropy) conservation is fun
the sim takes a bit too much time, needs some more optimization

高い表面張力の流体を精度良く計算するのは実は結構難しい、けど実現するとかなりたのしい https://t.co/QUunn47sZn
